title: I don't play Eve
body:
But for the love all things holy, why the hell do you insist on constantly thrashing her?

I've never seen a champ get hate like this from Riot. Least with Cass, Mordekaiser, Sona, and Kassadin, you just gave a giant middle finger to everyone and left.

But with her, you try to put out one nerf, then get backlash from the community, take it off, then try again with something else, get some more backlash.

When are you going to learn?

 Just stop, seriously, she's fine where she is, and considering balancing someone with perma-invisibility, that's quite a feat, just leave it alone.
